Direct message the job poster from VF Corporation
Paul Montague Jr.
Technical Recruiter at VF Corporation
VFs Applied Analytics and Decision Intelligence team is building a community ofboundless decision intelligence.We are accountable for building the systems, operating models, and insights that drive better,faster decisions across VFs brands and functions. Our mission isDrive decision intelligence by curating and supporting an evergreen suite of adaptable data product solutions and insights that drive action, democratize data access and usage by building and sustaining a service model that empowers and enables widespread data access and self-service, and build data literacy across VF by championing a culture of data-driven decision makingWe lead with curiosity and seek to understand why before whatWe are pathfinders that push the boundaries of what’s possible and drive decisive actionWe take risks and courageously challenge the status quoWe embrace and incubate diversity of skills, capabilities, and perspectives while emphasizing a bias for actionWe are sought out as thought partners and co-creators We transparently request and provide feedback for continuous improvementWe democratize data literacy and access, and measure our outcomesWe create consistency and trust through practical governance that evolves and scalesWe believe truths and not tools power our competitive advantageThe RoleThe Sr Manager, joining VF global integrated analytics & insights function, will lead a cross brand, delivery-focused function that delivers advanced analytics, insights, and storytelling that drives and infuse boundless decision intelligence among VFs brands and functions.The Sr Manager and the reporting team will maintain deep business context across brands and function to enable scalable data foundation paradigms, and business representationThe Sr Manager will work on enabling foundational analytic elements across different brands, to speed data experimentation at brand level, while maintaining core replicability and scalability as core co-creation driversThe Sr Manager will be a catalyst for amplifying the new cross functional (XF) operating model, that spark efficiency, drive foster innovation and growth for VF Corp and its brands, employees, and customers.The Sr Manager will partner with data science to scope AI/ML modelling to solve complex problems, and can articulately communicate the benefits, of these models, product to Brand’s senior stakeholdersThe Sr Manager will be responsible to lead and drive in depth analysis, applying complex advanced analytics modelling to solve complex problems, while creating a strong narrative that can influence and drive actions and analytics adoption in business functionsThe Sr Manager will maintain, evolve and improve relationships with Analytic and functional stakeholders, as well as all the business function, focusing on effective communication and strong negotiation The Sr Manager must continue expand deep knowledge across all existing and future data elements that coexist in VF data landscape and analytics platforms Advocate and responsible for creation of re-usable data products, patterns and frameworks for how to more deeply engage, activate, and optimize those behaviors, intrinsically through improvement within the Analytics foundation infrastructure. Skills for successThe person in this role will be expected to operate with a high degree of autonomy, and high-level direction and prioritization support from his/her manager Excellent communication skills and capability to manage different stakeholders, focusing on presence and development of stakeholder influence map will be key for success Technical acumen, while important, alone will not determine success in a rapidly evolving technical and business environment. The ability to challenge the status quo in a meaningful yet empathetic way will be key in ushering in a centralization transformation. The desire of this team is to continue to iterate toward the best decisioning products, fueling decision making and adoption of analytics innovation and products across our brands is a continuous optimization framework. The Sr Manager will manage team objectives, deadlines and work quality, supporting evolving high functional and performing team, infusing culture of feedback, collaboration and experimentation mindset Strong team leadership and motivational skills, including strategic foresight, managing through ambiguity, and seeing tasks through to completion A Master’s degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering or similar quantitative field and a minimum of 5+ years general professional experience in consumer analytics role or an equivalent combination of experience and training that provides the required knowledge, skills, and abilities. High proficiency in advanced analytics and programming languages (SQL, Python, R, SAS, etc.) Experience in data visualization using tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or equivalent. Experience working in Digital and eCommerce environment Experience working in retail with consumer data, managing large data sets of consumer data; fashion/retail industry knowledge preferred. Exceptional data exploration skills and natural curiosity regarding retail and consumer behavior. Understanding of the drivers of consumer lifetime value (CLV or LTV). Ability to influence and collaborate with cross-functional business partners Ability to work in a hybrid/remote work environment with teams from various regions Lastly, critical in this role is a humble and growth mindset
